title: When can I pursue a stenography course? - Quora

response.answer_text: The students who are interested in becoming Stenographers can pursue the course after completing high school. During certification courses in stenography English, students are introduced to the responsibilities of the profession. In this role, students are responsible for taking dictation in shorthand, preparing reports, and operating typewriters to transcribe dictated material. They are trained to perform a variety of clerical duties. According to the requirements, they might get an opportunity to work as Medical Stenographer, Legal Stenographer, Technical Stenographer, Police Stenographer, and Public Stenographer. They might take dictation in a foreign language and can be called as Foreign-Language Stenographer. With a stenography English certification, students can get an opportunity to work in different departments. After gaining years of experience in their field, students can look for better job opportunities. They can work in higher positions and earn a good salary package.
